page.title: 09THE TEXACO STORAGE PLANT
page.content: { The Texaco Storage Plant is on the left hand side of Haven Road. It is also quite close to the London And Costal Oil Wharves which is slightly bigger and contains highly dangerous chemicals. The Texaco Storage tanks themselves are about three double- decker buses high which is about 15 metres. The petrol tankers which deliver the petrol to Texaco garages, make their deliveries all over the South-East Coast of England. The security at the Texaco station is very tight because the fences are approximately 3 metres high. It has also got barbed wire all along the top of the fence. A bomb did go off at the terminal a few years ago, in 1979, but no great damage was done, and there wasn't a massive explosion.
